name: Rewind Time
description:
This game is very buggy. it wasn't in the editor but when i built it it became buggy, if you ever find yourself in a bad spot try to die and you should respawn in a better spot. I missed 3 days of this cuz my schedule and there's no music so its a bit depressing but i had some fun making it. Enjoy!

Tutorial: You automatically move to the right. You aim a gun with your mouse and shoot with LMB. You can jump by pressing space. You can rewind time by holding
